name: Mash Mash Mania!
description:
IT'S ABOUT DAMN TIME.

Button mashing is finally fun again!

  • Feverish high score arcade action.
  • Press the button, shout out to Desmond, brotha.
  • Learn the pattern then PRESS THE BUTTONS FASTER.
  • Pump up your combo with correct inputs.
  • Bank your score by letting the meter drop - the safe way to play.
  • Ascend to ultimate mastery by keeping the meter up all run!
  • Controller recommended, but keyboard works, too!
  • (Windows) - Xbox and Playstation controller support. (MacOS - PS4 support).
    • THE GAME WILL DETECT your input on the mode screen (right after title screen).  So if you plug in a controller on that screen, the game should find it within 2 seconds.
  • 12 modes * 3 controller types = 36 ways to test your skills!

Game jam theme - Pop!

Game jam mechanic modifier - Game over in 60 Seconds.

Shout out to Mike Tanner for the INTENSE main game theme. @macrosecosmos on Instagram.
